name: Cherry M-300R Wireless Laser Mouse
Features: [Ergonomic laser mouse for right-handed users with secure 2.4 GHz wireless technology and a particularly small USB-receiver, Nano USB-receiver which can remain in the laptop or be stored in the mouse when you're on the move, Laser sensor for precise work. Simple toggle of the resolution (slow / fast) via an easily-accessible switch on the top of the mouse, Wireless freedom with 2.4 GHz wireless technology offering up to 5 m range and interruption-free transmission, Ideal for use on the move with an energy-saving On / Off switch, Plug & Play for easy start up with no software installation]
